feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.1: Minor QR Code Fix
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • QR Code Print: Add More Allowed Params (#2045) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.16.3 to 1.16.4 (#2044) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.911.0 to 1.912.0 (#2043) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump devise from 4.9.3 to 4.9.4 (#2042) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.40.1

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Configuration Documentation
  • API Documentation

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.2: Language Strings & Minor Fixes
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Set default sort for Views (#2048) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Latest language strings (#2052) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.78.0 to 1.79.0 (#2051) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump mini_portile2 from 2.8.5 to 2.8.6 (#2049) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump foreman from 0.87.2 to 0.88.1 (#2050) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.912.0 to 1.913.0 (#2047) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.4: URLs Redirect Fix
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • URLs: Redirect after passphrase & disable turbolinks for form (#2059) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.146.1 to 1.147.0 (#2058) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.191.6 to 3.192.0 (#2056) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.1 to 0.5.2 (#2057) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.913.0 to 1.914.0 (#2055) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.5: Fix QR Code Dark Mode Display
entry.content:
Thanks to the anonymous tipster via the feedback form!

:memo: What’s Changed

  • QR Code: Support for Dark Mode (#2064) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.914.0 to 1.915.0 (#2062) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reviewdog/action-brakeman from 2.8.0 to 2.9.0 (#2061) @dependabot
